my:Hazard.my:ControlMeasures: The risk of working aloft during adverse weather conditions is too high and therefore must be postponed until the weather improves.

a) Working in the vicinity of the ship's whistle, the officer responsible should ensure that the power is shut off; b) Suitable warning notices should be posted on the bridge and in the machinery spaces.

a) Working in the vicinity of the funnel, the officer responsible should inform the duty engineer to ensure that steps are taken to reduce, as far as practicable, the emission of steam, harmful gases and fumes. b) Suitable warning notices should be posted on the bridge and in the machinery spaces.
